channel.description: Permission Classes and Types Permission classes user (u) group (g) other (o) (public) all (a) <- all combined Permission types r,w,x works differently on files and directories hyphen (-) represents no permissions set ls results permissions groupings rwx rw- râ€“ user (owner), group, and other (public) ls results first character meaning regular file d directory l symbolic link c character device file b block device file p named pipe s socket Modifying Access Permission Bits chmod command Modify permissions using symbolic or octal notation. Used by root or the file owner. Flags chmod -v ::: Verbose.
